ygData.subject: re to Tulwump
ygData.msgSnippet: any evil character can safely enter the tunnels under east freeport. there are guildmasters there, but they are all worshippers of innoruuk and other evil
ygData.messageBody:
any evil character can safely enter the tunnels under east freeport. there
are guildmasters there, but they are all worshippers of innoruuk and other
evil gods. they are there mostly for the benefit of people who are evil and
have lost enough faction that they can no longer walk the streets of
freeport to reach their usual guild.. also i believe that a few of them
(noteably clerics) are THE guildmasters for evil clerics who begin life in
freeport. after all, why would a guildmaster of the clerics of marr want to
train a cleric of innoruuk? :)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
